lead_paragraph: BORUCHOFF--Betsy, 82, of Riverdale, NY passed away at her home on June 12, 2016 after suffering from a stroke. Born on July 5, 1933 in New York City to the late Willma and Albert Musher. She graduated from Sarah Lawrence College in 1955 and earned a Masters Degree from Fordham University Graduate School of Social Work in 1979. She dedicated her life to helping others as a Board Certified Diplomat and Licensed Clinical Social Worker. She also worked for White Plains Hospital, the Phobia Clinic for 10 years, and graduated from the Psychoanalytic Institute of Counseling and Guidance. She was a member of Congregation Shir Ami and the National Association of Social Workers. Enjoyed travelling, Broadway shows, and helping others. She is survived by her loving husband of 62 years Leo, daughter, Nancy Orgel and predeceased by her daughter, Barbara (Boruchoff) Winer. She was the grandmother to Zoey and Evan Orgel, and Jeffrey, Hilary, and Alison Winer and great-grandmother to Mila and Haylie Piccoli. A graveside service will be held on June 14, 2016 at 2:30pm at the Kensico Cemetery, Sharon Gardens in Valhalla, NY. In lieu of flowers, please make donations in her honor to the charity of your choice. 1/3
